summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 91, Terry's 2nd Addition, being the alley between Terry Avenue and Boren Avenue, extending from James Street to Cherry Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 114562 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
